XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="EPVisitNumber" displayName="EPVisitNumber" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="User.EPVisitNumber" nullReplacement="No Data" countMeasureName="%COUNT" countMeasureCaption="# заявок" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="VisitLocation" displayName="Местоположение" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Все местоположения пациента" allDisplayName="Все местоположения пациента" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISHospitalCodeDR" factName="DxPatientLocation" name="PatientLocation" displayName="Местоположение пациента" description="Patient location" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="false"> <property sourceProperty="EPVISHospitalCodeDR.CTHOSName" name="PatientLocationName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="CareProviderDetails" displayName="Данные по врачам" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Все доктора" allDisplayName="Все доктора" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISDoctorCodeDR" factName="DxDoctor" name="Doctor" displayName="Врач" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="false"> <property sourceProperty="EPVISDoctorCodeDR.CTDRSurname" name="DoctorName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="PatientDetails" displayName="Данные по пациентам" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Все пациенты" allDisplayName="Все пациенты" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISAge" factName="DxAgeGroup" name="AgeGroup" displayName="Возрастная группа" disabled="false" list="false" rangeExpression="(,5]:0 to 5;[6,18]:6 to 18;[19,30]:19 to 30;[31,50]:31 to 50;[51,65]:51 to 65;[66,):over 65;" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceProperty="EPVISAge" name="Age" displayName="Возраст" disabled="true" list="false" nullReplacement="не указан" useDisplayValue="false"> <property sourceExpression="$CASE($LENGTH(%source.EPVISAge),2:%source.EPVISAge,:"0"_%source.EPVISAge)" name="AgeSort" disabled="false" hidden="true" sort="asc" isName="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISSpeciesDR.CTSPDesc" name="Species" displayName="Пол" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" nullReplacement="Нет данных" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H3" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISPatientType" factName="DxPatientType" name="PatientType" displayName="Тип пациента" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="true"> <property sourceProperty="EPVISPatientType.CTPATDescription" name="PatientTypeName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="EpisodeDetails" displayName="Данные по эпизоду" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Все заявки" allDisplayName="Все заявки" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetPriority(%source.EPVISPriorityCodeDR)" factName="DxPriority" name="EpisodePriority" displayName="Приоритет эпизода" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Обычный" useDisplayValue="false"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="UserDetails" displayName="Данные по пользователю" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Все пользователи" allDisplayName="Все пользователи" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISUserIDDR" factName="DxUserCode" name="UserCode" displayName="Пользователь" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="true"> <property sourceProperty="EPVISUserIDDR.SSUSRName" name="UserName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISUserSiteDR.CTUSLDesc" factName="DxUserSite" name="UserSite" displayName="Местоположение пользователя" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="ReceivingDate" displayName="Дата доставки" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All EPVISDateOfReceiving" allDisplayName="EPVISDateOfReceiving" sourceProperty="EPVISDateOfReceiving" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxReceivingYear" name="ReceivingYear" displayName="Год доставки" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level factName="DxReceivingMonth" name="ReceivingMonth" displayName="Месяц доставки" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level factName="DxReceivingDay" name="ReceivingDay" displayName="День доставки" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="ReceivingDayOfWeek" displayName="День недели доставки" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All EPVISCaseStudy" allDisplayName="EPVISCaseStudy" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetWeekday(%source.EPVISDateOfReceiving)" factName="DxRecDayOfWeek" name="ReceivingDayOfWeek" displayName="День недели доставки" disabled="false" list="false" rangeExpression="1:Воскресенье;2:Понедельник;3:Вторник;4:Среда;5:Четверг;6:Пятница;7:Суббота;" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="ReceivingTime" displayName="Время доставки" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All EPVISTimeOfReceiving" allDisplayName="EPVISTimeOfReceiving" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="%source.EPVISTimeOfReceiving" factName="DxRecTimeRange" name="ReceivingTimeRange" displayName="Диапазон времени доставки" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" rangeExpression="(,59]:00.00 - 00.59;[60,119]:01.00 - 01.59;[120,179]:02.00 - 02.59;[180,239]:03.00 - 03.59;[240,299]:04.00 - 04.59; [300,359]:05.00 - 05.59;[360,419]:06.00 - 06.59;[420,479]:07.00 - 07.59;[480,539]:08.00 - 08.59;[540,599]:09.00 - 09.59; [600,659]:10.00 - 10.59;[660,719]:11.00 - 11.59;[720,779]:12.00 - 12.59;[780,839]:13.00 - 13.59;[840,899]:14.00 - 14.59; [900,959]:15.00 - 15.59;[960,1019]:16.00 - 16.59;[1020,1079]:17.00 - 17.59;[1080,1139]:18.00 - 18.59;[1140,1199]:19.00 - 19.59;[1200,1259]:20.00 - 20.59;[1260,1319]:21.00 - 21.59;[1320,1379]:22.00 - 22.59;[1380,):23.00 - 23.59;" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="true"> <level sourceExpression="$ztime(%source.EPVISTimeOfReceiving*60,2)" factName="DxReceiveTime" name="TimeOfReceiving" displayName="Время доставки" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="FlagIsTestSets" displayName="Флаг, есть ли наборы тестов в заявке" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All FlagIsTestSets" allDisplayName="FlagIsTestSets" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetFlagIsTestSets(%source.%ID)" factName="DxFlagIsTestSets" name="FlagIsTestSets" displayName="Флаг существования наборов тестов в заявке" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="EnterDate" displayName="Дата ввода заявки" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All EnterDate" allDisplayName="EnterDate" sourceProperty="EPVISDateOfEntry" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxEnterYear" name="EnterYear" displayName="Год ввода зявки" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level factName="DxEnterMonth" name="EnterMonth" displayName="Месяц ввода заявки" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level factName="DxEnterDay" name="EnterDay" displayName="День ввода заявки" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Category" displayName="Категория" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Все категории" allDisplayName="Все категории" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="EPVISCategoryDR" factName="DxCategory" name="EPVISCategoryDR" displayName="Категория" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="true"> <property sourceProperty="EPVISCategoryDR.CTPADescription" name="CategoryName" displayName="Наименование категории" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Payer" displayName="Плательщик" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="По всем плательщикам" allDisplayName="По всем плательщикам" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetPayer(%source.%ID)" factName="DxPayerCode" name="PayerCode" displayName="Плательщик (код)" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetPayerName(%source.%ID)" factName="DxPayerName" name="PayerName" displayName="Плательщик" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetKolTestSets(%source.%ID)" factName="MxQTestSets" name="QTestSets" displayName="Кол-во наборов тестов в эпизоде" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetKolServicesInEpisode(%source.%ID)" factName="MxQServices" name="QServices" displayName="Количество услуг в эпизоде" description="Если в эпизоде есть супернабор, то все наборы тестов этого супернабора - это одна услуга." disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <relationship name="EPVisitTestSet" displayName="Visit Test Set Data" disabled="true" relatedCube="EPVisitTestSet" inverse="EPVisitNumber" cardinality="many"></relationship> <listing name="listEpisodes" displayName="Список заявок" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="%ID"></listing> </cube>
